content.description: Gave this an H-2 (what would likely be PG-13 today). H2: "Protection is strenuous or awkward to place, but excellent once in. Falls generally a maximum of 20 feet." At the time all I had for gear was stoppers and hexes...
content.location: The lieback crack L of Yocum's Chimney.

content.description: A quite adventurous route that is often dirty towards the top. The dirt makes it more fun if you let it.
content.protection: Double #2's and #3's are helpful. Optional #4. Optimal tree anchor right at the top out.
content.location: The beautiful cliff is full of color and hard to miss once you get below it. It is the obvious chimney to the right of the bolted slab climb.

content.description: Another beautiful and brightly colored face on the right end of the wall. Equipped by Cole Fennel.
content.location: Look for the bright orange face to the right and around the corner from Boob and Tit

content.description: The grey slab leads to a beautiful and colorful face. Very tall for the area. Route equipped by Andrew Blann and is now fully bolted awaiting a clean ascent.
content.location: Look for the bolted face to the right of "Yokum's Chimney."

content.description: Quality lie-backing cut short too soon.
content.protection: Possible to share anchors with Antares.
content.location: The crack immediately right of Antares.

content.protection: Build a gear anchor and finish on Yokum's chimney to the right.

content.description: There used to be a death-flake (may still be...) on this line. The upper section is a perfect hand crack.
content.protection: Stoppers and hexes are all I had...

content.description: The only bolted line on the wall. Crux move near the top.
content.protection: 5 bolts and carabiners at the top.
content.location: To the left of the two cracks.

content.description: A small and somewhat forgotten crag. Most will consider the 8 routes here not worth the trip, but if you combine it with all there is to explore in the area it can definitely be worth the trip! It is mostly trad but with only 8 routes to choose from it's best to bring the draws as well.
